results.name: Expansion of Product_{k>=1} (1 - x^k)^sigma(k).
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
formula: G.f.: exp(-Sum_{k>=1} sigma_2(k)*x^k/(k*(1 - x^k))). - _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, Oct 29 2018
xref: Product_{k>=1} (1 - x^k)^sigma_m(k): A288098 (m=0), this sequence (m=1), A288389 (m=2), A288392 (m=3).
results.author: _Seiichi Manyama_, Jun 08 2017
